summary: Path traversal was fixed, but the stale/incorrect compatibility export remains and was not addressed.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Stale exports and wrong compatibility export name in tests/e2e/vectors/index.ts
previous_issues_status.notes: The adapter still re-exports validateContractCompatibility instead of the expected validateCompatibility, so downstream imports will still break.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: loadVectorFile() allows path traversal via relativePath
previous_issues_status.notes: Path is now resolved and validated to remain under the package root.
